fields.title: Slug
fields.name: slug
fields.description: Allows to customize the document URL.

fields.title: Title
fields.name: title
fields.description: The text title of your document.

fields.title: Image
fields.name: image
fields.description: Cover or thumbnail image of your document.

fields.title: Last Update
fields.name: last_update
fields.description: Allows overriding the last update author/date.

fields.title: Tags
fields.name: tags
fields.description: A list of strings to tag to your docs.

fields.title: SEO Metadata Title
fields.name: title_meta
fields.description: The SEO metadata title of your document used in <head> for <title> and og:title.

fields.title: Keywords
fields.name: keywords
fields.description: Keywords meta tag for the document page, for search engines.

fields.title: Draft
fields.name: draft
fields.description: Draft documents will only be available during development.

fields.title: Sidebar Label
fields.name: sidebar_label
fields.description: The text shown in the document sidebar for this document.

fields.title: Sidebar Position
fields.name: sidebar_position
fields.description: Controls the position of a doc inside the generated sidebar slice when using autogenerated sidebar items.

fields.title: Pagination Label
fields.name: pagination_label
fields.description: The text used in the document next/previous buttons for this document.

fields.title: Pagination Next
fields.name: pagination_next
fields.description: The ID of the documentation you want the "Next" pagination to link to.

fields.title: Pagination Prev
fields.name: pagination_prev
fields.description: The ID of the documentation you want the "Previous" pagination to link to.

fields.title: Hide Title
fields.name: hide_title
fields.description: Whether to hide the title at the top of the doc.

fields.title: Hide Table of Contents
fields.name: hide_table_of_contents
fields.description: Whether to hide the table of contents to the right.

fields.title: ToC Minimum Heading Level
fields.name: toc_min_heading_level
fields.description: The minimum heading level shown in the table of contents.

fields.title: ToC Maximum Heading Level
fields.name: toc_max_heading_level
fields.description: The maximum heading level shown in the table of contents.
